A PSFrame is a 3D coordinate system, represented by a PSFrame.position() and an PSFrame.orientation().

Default constructor.
PSInteractiveFrame - Class in proscene
A PSInteractiveFrame is a PSFrame that can be rotated and translated using the mouse.

Default constructor.
PSInteractiveFrame.CoordinateSystemConvention - Enum in proscene
This enum defines the coordinate system convention which is defined as LEFT_HANDED by default (processing standard).
